data.question: Price discrimination exists when

option.a: The same product of the same quality is sold for different prices of the same buyer
option.b: The same product of the same quality is sold for different prices to different buyers
option.c: Different products are sold for the same price to the same buyers
option.d: Different products are sold for the same price to different buyers.

data.question: The following may not inflate the National Income figure

option.a: Student’s bursary
option.b: Owners occupied houses
option.c: Office Inducement
option.d: Intermediate goods

data.question: If salary of worker increases from 50,000 to 80,000 Naira and average price of certain commodities consumed by the worker increase from 120 Naira to 160 Naira then

option.a: The nominal income increases but leave the real income constant
option.b: The real income increases, but nominal income has reduced
option.c: The nominal income increases, but real income decreases
option.d: Both the nominal and real income increase

data.question: Roles of central bank include the following except

option.a: Lender of last resort to commercial bank
option.b: Banker to commercial bank
option.c: Regulator to both the money and capital markets
option.d: Receipt  of government deposits

data.question: Ordinary shareholders and preferential shareholders are different because

option.a: Preferential shareholders participate and can vote and be voted for during the  AGM
option.b: ordinary shareholders are given priority in case the company is liquidated
option.c: Preferential shareholders are prominent shareholders than ordinary shareholders
option.d: Ordinary shareholders are the core shareholders in the company

data.question: Normal profit means;

option.a: All the accountant cost are covered but not all the economist cost
option.b: All the economist cost are covered but not all the accountant cost
option.c: More than economist cost are covered
option.d: None of the economist and Accountant costs is covered

data.question: Perfect price elastic supply means

option.a: No change in supply as price changes
option.b: Any change in price completely stops supply
option.c: Changes in price double supply
option.d: A change in price leads to proportionate change in supply

data.question: Change in demand and change in quantity demanded are not the same because

option.a: All factors affecting change in demand also affect change in quantity demanded except income
option.b: All factors affecting change in demand are not affecting change in quantity demanded except income
option.c: Many factors leads to change in demand but only change in price affect change in quantity demanded
option.d: Many factors leads to change in demand but only change in income affect change in quantity demanded

data.question: Private and public limited liability companies are not the same because

option.a: Former is limited to fifty shareholders but not the later
option.b: both are not legal entities
option.c: Former is established secretly but latter is located in central places
option.d: Former is managed by board of directors but latter is managed by board of management.

data.question: Legal Entity means

option.a: A company is owned by large number of people
option.b: A company is owned by small number of people
option.c: A company is insulated against litigation
option.d: A company is not insulated against litigation

data.question: The following is not true of price mechanism

option.a: Equilibrium price is determined by forces of demand and supply
option.b: Individual households and firms pursue personal interest
option.c: Producers and consumers are rational in decision making
option.d: Price control in prominent in the commodity and input markets.

data.question: Inflation as a result of increase in the payment for factors of production is called

option.a: Cost-pull inflation
option.b: Demand-push inflation
option.c: Cost-push inflation
option.d: Demand pull inflation

data.question: The following is not correct

option.a: Average variable cost equals average total cost minus average fixed cost
option.b: Average fixed cost equals average variable cost minus average total cost
option.c: Average total cost equals average variable cost plus average fixed cost
option.d: Average total cost minus average variable cost equals average fixed cost

data.question: The following is the main difference between firm and industry

option.a: Industry is the group of firms producing related products
option.b: Industry is the group of firms in the manufacturing sector
option.c: Industry is the group of firms in different sectors of the economy
option.d: Industry is the group of firms with a single pressure group

data.question: Yam and palm oil are together; therefore

option.a: Yam is a substitute good while palm oil is a complementary good
option.b: Yam is complimentary good while palm oil is a substitute good
option.c: Yam and oil are complimentary goods
option.d: Yam and beans are substitute goods

data.question: Discount rate means

option.a: Rate at which money are borrowed from commercial bank
option.b: Rate at which bank receive deposit from the public
option.c: Central bank rate on the money borrowed by commercial banks
option.d: Commercial bank rate on the money borrowed from other commercial bank

data.question: Indifference curve and isoquant are respectively relevant is

option.a: Theories of consumer behaviours and production
option.b: Theories of human indifference and production
option.c: Theories of trade and production
option.d: Theories of production and trade

data.question: A commodity is said to be price inelastic if

option.a: Changes in the quantity purchased of a good is less than proportionate changes in its price
option.b: Changes in the quantity purchased of a good is proportional to changes in its price
option.c: Changes in the quantity purchased of a good is more than proportionate changes in its price
option.d: The quantity purchased of a good never responds to change in its price.

data.question: If the price of commodity X increases because of the increase in the price vis-à-vis the increase in demand  for other commodities are likely to be

option.a: Complimentary
option.b: Substitute
option.c: Compose
option.d: Intermediate

data.question: When Lump-sun tax is paid by a producer, it means that;

option.a: The tax is paid proportional to the quantity of output produced
option.b: The tax is paid regardless of volume of output
option.c: The tax is paid in arrears
option.d: The tax is returned to the producer after the payment

data.question: The parameter ‘b’ in a consumption function of the form; C = a + bY; where Y is the National income is

option.a: Marginal benefit of consumption
option.b: Marginal propensity to purchase
option.c: Marginal propensity to consume
option.d: Marginal propensity to save

data.question: A stock variable is measured;

option.a: Over a period
option.b: At a point
option.c: Consistently
option.d: Intermittently

data.question: In the ownership structure of joint stock company the following is correct;

option.a: Ordinary shareholders are stronger than preferential shareholders
option.b: Preferential shareholder are stronger than ordinary shareholders
option.c: Ordinary shareholders are settled first in case of company’s liquidation
option.d: Ordinary and preferential shareholders are perpetual rivals

data.question: The difference between the output proceedings of Nigerians abroad and foreigners in Nigeria is known as;

option.a: Net export to abroad
option.b: Net import from abroad
option.c: Net income from abroad
option.d: Net income to abroad

data.question: When the government expenditure and income are the same in fiscal year, this is referred as;

option.a: Net balance
option.b: Zero balanced budget
option.c: Balanced budget
option.d: Net income
